about_the_game:
Do you deal with toxic people every day?...
Well, you are not the only one.
In this little game the characters will be those people who treat you like garbage at work in the family and on the street and even at parties and the list goes on.
You will make the decision whether to forgive those bad people who do not value others or value their luck.
First person shooter Psychological horror, where you will find traps, monsters, normal people and weapons, The game will be varied, you will not feel anything repetitive, there will be moments where fighting will be an option and others where running will be the only option, The villain Bill will be in charge of teaching you the tutorial and will tell you the description and history of each character.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains explicit violence, gore, blood, sexual content, nudity, and drug use

name: HARD TAPES

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: First person shooter Psychological horror, which is about sick thought experiments that will be seen thanks to some videotapes and demonstrate what dark is the world now.
